meaningMnemonic: You are going to <kanji>untie</kanji> the person who is in your <kanji>employ</kanji> from being employed with you. They are free. This means you fired them, which is why this verb means <vocabulary>to fire someone</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
